data.subTitle: 多重继承
data.content:
function Class10(){
  this.showSub = function(a,b){
        alert(a - b);
    }   
}

function Class11(){
  this.showAdd = function(a,b){
        alert(a + b);
    }  
}

function Class12(){
  Class10.apply(this);
  Class11.apply(this);   
  // Class10.call(this);
  //Class11.call(this);  
}

var c2 = new Class12();
c2.showSub(3,1);    //2
c2.showAdd(3,1);    //4
